column4: Oracle CEO sees benefit if rival buys Salesforce.com
column5: REDWOOD CITY  Calif. Oracle Corp  Chief Executive Safra Catz said her company could benefit if Microsoft Corp  or another rival bought online customer relationship management firm Salesforce.com Inc .

column4: UPDATE 2-Oracle CEO sees benefit if rival buys Salesforce.com
column5: REDWOOD CITY  Calif.  April 30 Oracle Corp  Chief Executive Safra Catz said her company could benefit if Microsoft Corp or another rival bought online customer relationship management firm Salesforce.com Inc .

column4: Microsoft opens door to Android  Apple phone apps
column5: SAN FRANCISCO Microsoft Corp  is making it easier for apps written for rival Google Inc's  Android and Apple Inc's  iOS systems to work on Windows phones  in a bid to attract users to its unpopular mobile devices  the company's operating systems chief said on Wednesday.

column4: Tesla hunts for new revenue in home storage batteries
column5: LOS ANGELES Tesla Motors Inc shares slipped Thursday after a month-long surge ahead of Chief Executive Elon Musk's expected announcement that the money-losing electric luxury car maker will seek new revenues from batteries for storing electricity at homes and businesses. | Video

column4: Exclusive: Intel's standstill with Altera expires in June - sources
column5: Intel Corp  signed a standstill agreement earlier this year with Altera Corp  that expires on June 1  giving the world's largest chipmaker the option to launch a hostile bid after that  according to sources familiar with the matter.
